explains: n. 殖民者；殖民地居民；移民
adj. 殖民主义者的；奉行殖民主义的

sentences.en: He is the colonist, the empire builder.
sentences.cn: 他是一个殖民者，帝国建造者。

sentences.en: He is the very prototype of the empire builder, the pioneer colonist.
sentences.cn: 他是帝国创立者的原型，囚犯殖民者。

sentences.en: Just a few meters ahead, you run into a colonist who warns you not to go up the road.
sentences.cn: 走了几米有一个殖民者会过来警告你别继续向前。
